description: This speedy san choy bow recipe is perfect for work lunches or no-fuss dinners. Plus, it's nutritionally approved, so give it a try today.
keywords: San choy bow,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Bowl,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Beef
name: San Choy Bow Bowls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 225g canned sliced water chestnuts, drained, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Soak noodles in a large bowl of boiling water for 2 minutes or until soft. Drain and set aside.
Combine cornflour and 1/4 cup water in a small bowl. Str in sauces and garlic.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook mince for 5 minutes, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, or until browned. Add chestnuts, onion and sauce mixture. Cook, stirring, for a further 5 minutes or until sauce has thickened slightly.
Arrange lettuce in bowls. Top with noodles, beef mixture, carrot, chilli and coriander. Serve.
